doorlock.name: Yale Doorlocks
doorlock.description: Key-free access with the keypad, Yale Access app on your smartphone or Apple Watch, or optional Auto-Unlock via Bluetooth

doorlock.name: Baldwin Doorlocks
doorlock.description: When people say it’s lonely at the top...

doorlock.name: Solity Doorlocks
doorlock.description: Advanced Keyless Entry and Biometric Guest Access: Our Fingerprint Smart Deadbolt elevates security with dual access options, accommodating up to 50 fingerprint scans and 50 customizable password codes.

doorlock.name: Eufy Doorlocks
doorlock.description: Crystal-Clear Visitor Insights: Experience superior clarity with 1080p HD resolution and WDR, ensuring every detail at your doorstep is captured in vivid quality, day or night.

doorlock.name: Teeho Doorlocks
doorlock.description: Fingerprint Keypad Door Lock with Handle: Comes with a fingerprint keypad deadbolt, 2 lever handles and no additional purchase required. In addition, the keyless entry door lock has a backlit keypad, low battery alert, anti-snoop code, silent mode and vacation mode

doorlock.name: TT Smart DoorLock
doorlock.description: ensitive conductors sense your fingerprint in 360 degrees and recognize your finger within 0.3S. Recognition rate is higher than 98%.More accurate biometric door lock keeps your home safe and sound

light.name: Amazon Basics Led Light
light.description: Control your Amazon Basics smart light bulbs using your voice or via the Alexa app, no more turning on/off each individual light switch

light.name: Fiet Led Light
light.description: WIFI-ENABLED TO CONTROL FROM ANYWHERE - Compatible with 2.4 GHz Wifi network; Control your smart bulb with the Feit Electric app from anywhere in or outside your home

light.name: Tp-Link Led Light Bulb
light.description: Matter-Compatible high-lumen multicolor smart bulb that seamlessly integrates with certified smart home platforms, including Apple Home, Amazon Alexa, Google Assistant, and Samsung SmartThings

light.name: Goove Led Light
light.description: 6 Million DIY Colors: Govee smart light bulbs own millions of color and 54 preset scene modes, you can explore your favored one or pick one suits your moods most, bringing yourself a real fantastic lighting experience (Working Voltage: AC 120V)

light.name: Sengled Smart Bulb
light.description: Color changing WiFi Classic smart bulbs that work with Alexa and Google Home. Control your smart light bulb via voice commands to turn your smart bulbs on/off, create colorful mood scenes, adjust brightness and more

thermostat.name: Google Nest Thermostats
thermostat.description: Nest Hello is now the Nest Thermostats (wired); no matter which name is on the box, you will find the same great product inside

thermostat.name: Ecobee Smart Thermostats
thermostat.description: Your Ecobee thermostats and cameras will ring throughout the house and you can even see and talk to visitors live through your Smart Thermostat Premium.

thermostat.name: Sensi Smart Thermostats
thermostat.description: Top-rated app guides you through each step of the install using universal Bluetooth technology for easier setup. Works with HVAC equipment found in most homes

thermostat.name: Honeywell Thermostats
thermostat.description: Provides intelligent heating and cooling management, learning your habits to optimize energy usage and save on utility bills. It also integrates seamlessly with smart home systems

thermostat.name: Godrej CYNC Smart Thermostats
thermostat.description: Whether at home or on the go, program the smart thermostat for home heat and AC with auto mode, set custom schedules, and turn up the heat or cool down your home with the CYNC app No bridge or hub required

thermostat.name: Lennox Smart Thermostat
thermostat.description: Works with premium LennoxÂ® communicating equipment only AND pairs with Lennox Smart Accessories (Smart Room Sensors, Smart Air Quality Monitor and Wireless Extender)
